cards.rules_text: Bleed deals 6 damage to any target. You gain 6 life.

Exile all creatures and planeswalkers.
Exile all graveyards.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Not even ashes remain to bear witness.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Put a protection from everything counter on target permanent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Shiroyuki reached for power, achieved it, and found herself so utterly alone.[/i]

[i]“All that you are, and all that you might have been—I want that.”
—Serenyi, the Heresiarch[/i]

cards.rules_text: Draw four cards. You gain 4 life.

First strike
When Azalea and Aksin enters, exile up to one target nonland permanent you don't control until they leave the battlefield.
{3}{U}{B}: Put a permanent card exiled by Azalea and Aksin onto the battlefield under your control.

Deathtouch, protection from legendary
When Vielle and Serenyi enters, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
You may activate loyalty abilities of permanents you control an additional time each turn.

When Shiroyuki, Shiroyuki, and Shiroyuki enters, conjure a version of Shiroyuki, Shiroyuki, and Shiroyuki with suspend into exile with three time counters on it. [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)[/i]

Wish. [i](Choose a legal card name. Conjure it into your hand.)[/i]
A deck can only start with one card named Sacred Wish.

At the beginning of your end step, you may put three -1/-1 counters on target creature you control without a counter on it. If you do, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Then if it has power 0 or less, destroy it.

When Reality Slasher enters, conjure Deletion into your hand. [i](It's a {2} sorcery with “Exile target nonland permanent.”)[/i]
When Reality Slasher dies, conjure Deletion into an opponent's hand.
Discard your hand. Then draw X cards, where X is one plus the greatest number of cards in an opponent's hand.
